content:
I'm happy to announce an open PhD position (3 years) and an open postdoc position (2 years) on categorical probability at the University of Innsbruck, Austria. I would appreciate it if you could forward this information to anyone who might be interested. And apologies for the multiple postings, which seem to be hard to avoid.

These are pure research positions funded by a grant from the Austrian Science Fund. Thus teaching is not expected, but possible if desired. The intended starting date for both positions is October 1. The deadline for applications is July 15. See the links below for how to apply.

If there are any further questions, please don't hesitate to get in touch! Either directly here or by emailing me at tobias.fritz@uibk.ac.at.

Links:
https://www.uibk.ac.at/mathematik/ausschreibung_phd.pdf
https://www.uibk.ac.at/mathematik/ausschreibung_postdoc.pdf
